name: JuniorQuizRightorWrong
0:
”Alexa, open junior quiz!”
”Alexa, play junior quiz!”
”Alexa, start junior quiz!”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: junior quiz
des:
The fun quiz for children starting from 3 years!

You will be asked a total of 10 questions from different categories. You will receive coins for correct answers. All other kids quiz players will also collect coins. The more coins you have, the higher you are in the junior quiz ranking. You will receive bonus points for the first quiz per day and for every tenth completed quiz.

The quiz is constantly being expanded with new questions and categories.
Have fun playing!


GAME CATEGORIES

> Animal voices
Does the animal voice really correspond to the animal in question?

> Guessing noises
Can you really hear the sound we are searching for?

> Colors
Does the object really have the color in question?

>Children television series
Are the statements about children's television series really correct?

The following series are currently included in the quiz:
 - Bob the builder
 - Fireman Sam
 - Paw Patrol
 - Peppa Pig

> Objects, Nature, General Knowledge
Are the statements really true?


GAME CONTROLS

- "YES" or "NO" to answer a question
- "Repeat" to repeat a question.
- "Help" for help
- "Restart" to restart the kids' quiz.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
